Bar Charts.description: Read [here](https://vega.github.io/vega-lite/docs/size.html#offset-step) for more details about how to set step size for grouped bar.

Line Charts.name: line
Line Charts.title: Line Chart

Line Charts.name: line_overlay
Line Charts.title: Line Chart with Point Markers
Line Charts.description:
By setting the `point` property of the line mark definition to an object defining a property of the overlaying point marks, we can overlay point markers on top of line. 

 Notes: (1) This is equivalent to adding another layer of point marks. 
 (2) While `"point"` marks are normally semi-transparent, the overlay point marker has `opacity` = 1 by default.

Line Charts.name: line_overlay_stroked
Line Charts.title: Line Chart with Stroked Point Markers
Line Charts.description:
By setting the `point` property of the line mark definition to an object defining a property of the overlaying point marks, we can overlay point markers on top of line. Here we create stroked points by setting their `"filled"` to `false` and their `fill` to `"white"`. 

 Notes: (1) This is equivalent to adding another layer of point marks. 
 (2) While `"point"` marks are normally semi-transparent, the overlay point marker has `opacity` = 1 by default.

Line Charts.name: line_color
Line Charts.title: Multi Series Line Chart

Line Charts.name: repeat_layer
Line Charts.title: Multi Series Line Chart with Repeat Operator

Line Charts.name: line_color_halo

Line Charts.title: Connected Scatterplot (Lines with Custom Paths)
Line Charts.description: A connected scatterplot can be created by customizing line `order` and adding `point` overlay in the line mark definition.

Circular Plots.name: arc_pie
Circular Plots.title: Pie Chart
Circular Plots.description: A pie chart encodes proportional differences among a set of numeric values as the angular extent and area of a circular slice.

Circular Plots.name: arc_pie_normalize_tooltip
Circular Plots.title: Pie Chart with percentage_tooltip
Circular Plots.description: A pie chart with a tooltip that shows the percentage covered by the hovered slice.

Circular Plots.name: arc_donut
Circular Plots.title: Donut Chart
Circular Plots.description: A donut chart encodes proportional differences among a set of numeric values using angular extents.

Circular Plots.name: layer_arc_label
Circular Plots.title: Pie Chart with Labels
Circular Plots.description: Layering text over arc marks to label pie charts. For now, [you need to add `stack: true`](https://github.com/vega/vega-lite/issues/5078) to theta to force the text to apply the same polar stacking layout.

Circular Plots.name: arc_radial
Circular Plots.title: Radial Plot
Circular Plots.description: This radial plot uses both angular and radial extent to convey multiple dimensions of data. However, this approach is not perceptually effective, as viewers will most likely be drawn to the total area of the shape, conflating the two dimensions. This example also demonstrates a way to add labels to circular plots.

Advanced Calculations.title: Relative Bar Chart (Calculate Percentage of Total)

Advanced Calculations.title: Waterfall Chart of Monthly Profit and Loss

Advanced Calculations.name: window_top_k
Advanced Calculations.title: Filtering Top-K Items
Advanced Calculations.description: Here we use window transform to derive the total number of students along with the rank of the current student to determine the top K students and display their score.

Advanced Calculations.name: lookup
Advanced Calculations.title: Using the lookup transform to combine data

Labeling & Annotation.name: layer_bar_fruit
Labeling & Annotation.title: Simple Bar Chart with Labels and Emojis

Labeling & Annotation.name: layer_line_co2_concentration
Labeling & Annotation.title: Carbon Dioxide in the Atmosphere
Labeling & Annotation.description: This example was inspired by [Gregor Aisch](https://github.com/gka)'s [Carbon Dioxide Concentration By Decade](https://www.datawrapper.de/_/OHgEm/).

Labeling & Annotation.name: layer_bar_annotations
Labeling & Annotation.title: Bar Chart Highlighting Values beyond a Threshold
Labeling & Annotation.description: To create a bar chart that highlights values beyond a threshold, we use two `layer`s of `bar` marks. The lower layer shows all the bars while the upper layer shows bar with values above the threshold in red (`#e45755`).  We then `layer` a `rule` mark and a `text` mark over the bars to annotate the threshold value.

Labeling & Annotation.name: layer_histogram_global_mean
Labeling & Annotation.title: Histogram with a Global Mean Overlay

Labeling & Annotation.name: layer_line_rolling_mean_point_raw
Labeling & Annotation.title: Layering Rolling Averages over Raw Values

Labeling & Annotation.name: layer_likert
Labeling & Annotation.title: Distributions and Medians of Likert Scale Ratings
Labeling & Annotation.description: Distributions and Medians of Likert Scale Ratings. (Figure 9 from @jhoffswell and @zcliu's 'Interactive Repair of Tables Extracted from PDF Documents on Mobile Devices' -- http://idl.cs.washington.edu/files/2019-InteractiveTableRepair-CHI.pdf).

Labeling & Annotation.name: concat_layer_voyager_result
Labeling & Annotation.title: Comparative Likert Scale Ratings
Labeling & Annotation.description: Comparing Likert scale ratings between two conditions. (Figure 10. from @kanitw et al.'s "Voyager 2: Augmenting Visual Analysis with Partial View Specifications" -- http://idl.cs.washington.edu/files/2017-Voyager2-CHI.pdf).

Other Layered Plots.name: bar_layered_weather
Other Layered Plots.title: Weekly Weather Plot
Other Layered Plots.description: Inspired by this Vega example. Weekly weather data plot representing high/low ranges of record temperatures (light grey), average temperatures (dark grey), and both predicted and observed temperatures (black) for the given week. The first five days have high/low ranges of observed temperatures, and the last five days have ranges of predicted temperatures, where the upper barbell represents the range of high temperature predictions and the lower barbell represents the range of low temperature predictions. Created by @melissatdiamond.

Other Layered Plots.name: wheat_wages
Other Layered Plots.title: Wheat and Wages Example
Other Layered Plots.description: A recreation of William Playfairâ€™s classic chart visualizing the price of wheat, the wages of a mechanic, and the reigning British monarch. Based on a chart by @manzt.

Interactive Charts.name: interactive_bar_select_highlight
Interactive Charts.title: Bar Chart with Highlighting on Hover and Selection on Click

Interactive Charts.name: interactive_histogram_full_height_hover
Interactive Charts.title: Histogram with Full-Height Hover Targets for Tooltip

Interactive Charts.name: point_href
Interactive Charts.title: Scatterplot with External Links and Tooltips

Interactive Charts.name: interactive_area_brush
Interactive Charts.title: Area Chart with Rectangular Brush
Interactive Charts.descripton: In this example, we apply an `interval` selection to select subset of data in an area chart. The selected data is highlighted in gold by the second layer of an area mark that `filter`s its data by the `brush` selection.

Interactive Charts.name: selection_layer_bar_month
Interactive Charts.title: Interactive Average
Interactive Charts.description: The plot below uses an interval selection, which causes the chart to include an interactive brush (shown in grey). The brush selection parameterizes the red guideline, which visualizes the average value within the selected interval.

Interactive Charts.name: interactive_line_hover
Interactive Charts.title: Multi Series Line Chart with an Interactive Line Highlight
Interactive Charts.description: The plot below uses argmax to position text labels at the end of line.  It also applies single selection to highlight a hovered line.  Note that we can hidden thick lines to make it easier to hover.

Interactive Charts.name: interactive_line_point_hover
Interactive Charts.title: Multi Series Line Chart with an Interactive Point Highlight

Interactive Charts.name: interactive_multi_line_label
Interactive Charts.title: Multi Series Line Chart with Labels
Interactive Charts.description: The plot displays labels for all stock prices of the hovered time. The example is forked/modified from [@jakevdp's block](https://bl.ocks.org/jakevdp/a414950f61e4b224765f2439dd1f09b9).

Interactive Charts.name: interactive_multi_line_pivot_tooltip
Interactive Charts.title: Multi Series Line Chart with Tooltip
Interactive Charts.description: The plot displays labels for all stock prices of the hovered time. This example uses a pivot transform to compute the data for the tooltip.

Interactive Charts.name: interactive_multi_line_tooltip
Interactive Charts.title: Multi Series Line Chart with Tooltip
Interactive Charts.description: This plot requires the data to have different series in different fields.  See [#1274](https://github.com/vega/vega-lite/issues/1274) and [#1552](https://github.com/vega/vega-lite/issues/1552) for relevant future syntax improvements.

Interactive Charts.name: isotype_grid
Interactive Charts.title: Isotype Grid
Interactive Charts.description: Inspired by this [D3 example by Alan Smith](http://bl.ocks.org/alansmithy/d832fc03f6e6a91e99f4). Drag region to select. This example was created by @jwoLondon.

Interactive Charts.name: brush_table
Interactive Charts.title: Brushing Scatter Plot to show data on a table

Interactive Charts.name: param_search_input
Interactive Charts.description: Search to highlight the relevant car models. Regexes are supported so you can type e.g. `mazda|ford`
Interactive Charts.title: Search Input

Interactive Multi-View Displays.name: interactive_seattle_weather
Interactive Multi-View Displays.title: Seattle Weather Exploration
Interactive Multi-View Displays.description: This graph shows an interactive view of Seattle's weather, including maximum temperature, amount of precipitation, and type of weather. By clicking and dragging on the scatter plot, you can see the proportion of days in that range that have sun, rain, fog, snow, etc. Created by @jakevdp.

Interactive Multi-View Displays.name: interactive_global_development
Interactive Multi-View Displays.title: An interactive scatter plot of global health statistics by country and year.
Interactive Multi-View Displays.description: Similar to the Vega version at https://vega.github.io/vega/examples/global-development/.
